title: Trimming, early 19th century
medium: White, black  and colored silk in uncut velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Two shields, one showing three birds below five stars, and the other, a lion and red and yellow strips; crown above shields; ornaments between.  Red, yellow, blue, and black on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, early 19th century.
early 19th century. White, black  and colored silk in uncut velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-44.
